doc:
Ann Davies (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ann_Davies_(actress) 0 Ann Cuerton Davies (born 25 November 1934, London) is an English actress. She was the wife of actor Richard Briers until his death in February 2013, and the mother of actress Lucy Briers and Katie Briers. She also acted with Briers in the films Peter's Friends (1992) and In the Bleak Midwinter (1995). One of her earliest television appearances was as the character Jenny in the BBC series Doctor Who in the story entitled The Dalek Invasion of Earth. In 2003 Davies appeared in an episode of the series Doctors as the character Annette Ludlow. Ann_Cuerton_Davies ( born 25_November_1934 , London ) is an_English_actress . She was the_wife of actor_Richard_Briers until his_death in February_2013 , and the_mother of actress_Lucy_Briers and Katie_Briers . She also acted with Briers in the_films_Peter 's_Friends_(_1992 ) and In the_Bleak_Midwinter_(_1995_) . One of her_earliest_television_appearances was as the_character Jenny in the_BBC_series_Doctor Who in the_story entitled The_Dalek_Invasion of Earth . In 2003_Davies appeared in an_episode of the_series_Doctors as the_character_Annette_Ludlow .
